parameters.name: From
parameters.description: The ID of the request source. Set the value to **sas**.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese.
*   **en**: English.

parameters.name: UserLogStore
parameters.description: The name of the Logstore that stores logs.
